query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		__inputvalue {
			defaultValue,
			deprecationReason,
			description,
			isDeprecated,
			name,
			type {
				description,
				enumValues,
				fields,
				inputFields,
				interfaces,
				isOneOf,
				kind,
				name,
				ofType {
					description,
					enumValues,
					fields,
					inputFields,
					interfaces,
					isOneOf,
					kind,
					name,
					ofType {
						description,
						enumValues,
						fields,
						inputFields,
						interfaces,
						isOneOf,
						kind,
						name,
						ofType {
							description,
							enumValues,
							fields,
							inputFields,
							interfaces,
							isOneOf,
							kind,
							name,
							ofType {
								description,
								enumValues,
								fields,
								inputFields,
								interfaces,
								isOneOf,
								kind,
								name,
								possibleTypes,
								specifiedByURL,
							},
							possibleTypes,
							specifiedByURL,
						},
						possibleTypes,
						specifiedByURL,
					},
					possibleTypes,
					specifiedByURL,
				},
				possibleTypes,
				specifiedByURL,
			},
		}
	}
